original_title: The Ultimate (Beginners) Guide to Disturbing Movies
overview: After 10 plus years of covering “the most disturbing movies ever made” YouTuber HorribleReviews created the ultimate beginners guide to disturbing movies. 200 or so movie titles and 21 special guests are featured in this ultimate comprehensive. From dark and depraved to Asian extreme no disturbing stone is left unturned.
title: The Ultimate (Beginners) Guide to Disturbing Movies
